name: Release Notes - v2024.4.5
description: Hoppscotch Desktop App is a cross-platform desktop application built with Tauri and Hoppscotch Web Client. It is a standalone version of Hoppscotch that can be installed on your computer and used without a browser. Hoppscotch Desktop App is currently in alpha and is available for Mac, Windows and Linux.
title: Release Notes - v2024.4.5
